description: An independent inquiry into Abbotswood Nursing Home is being carried out, the health minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Independent investigation into Manx nursing home hit by Covid-19
title_page: Coronavirus: Independent investigation into Manx nursing home hit by Covid-19 - BBC News
maintext: "We wish to extend our thoughts and prayers to the people we have been privileged to care for, and their families and friends who have been affected by the tragic events of recent weeks."
